name: paxauroratheme
description: A modern UI redesign for VS Code with animated gradients, custom styling, video backgrounds, and refined dark colors.

vscode-modernized.autoApplyTheme.description: Automatically apply the 'Pax Aurora' theme when enabling styles. Disable this if you prefer to use your own theme.

vscode-modernized.ui.spacing.description: Controls the general spacing used for margins and padding around UI elements (e.g., sidebar, editor group). Use positive CSS units like rem, px, em (e.g., '0.5rem', '10px'). Warning: Setting extreme values might negatively impact usability.
vscode-modernized.ui.spacing.patternErrorMessage: Please enter a valid positive CSS unit (e.g., '0.5rem', '8px').

vscode-modernized.ui.borderRadius.description: Controls the roundness of corners for elements like tabs, sidebar, panels, and inputs. Use positive CSS units like rem, px, em (e.g., '0.5rem', '8px'). Warning: Setting extreme values might negatively impact usability.
vscode-modernized.ui.borderRadius.patternErrorMessage: Please enter a valid positive CSS unit (e.g., '0.5rem', '8px').

vscode-modernized.ui.tabSpacing.description: Controls the spacing between editor tabs. Use positive CSS units like rem, px, em (e.g., '0.2rem', '4px'). Warning: Setting extreme values might negatively impact usability.
vscode-modernized.ui.tabSpacing.patternErrorMessage: Please enter a valid positive CSS unit (e.g., '0.2rem', '4px').
